bibl.idno: Papers of Jefferson Randolph Kean [manuscript] / Jefferson Randolph Kean, 1860-1950. MSS 628. The Albert and Shirley Small Special Collections Library, University of Virginia, Charlottesville, Va.

bibl.title: Telegram from Harvey E. Jordan to Jefferson Randolph Kean, December 18, 1942

div1.p: On behalf of the medical faculty at the University of Virginia, Jordan congratulates Kean on receiving the Gorgas Medal. [Courtesy of The Albert and Shirley Small Special Collections Library, University of Virginia Library]

div1.head: Telegram from Harvey E. Jordan to Jefferson Randolph Kean, December 18, 1942
div1.p:
This is a full-rate
Telegram or Cable-
gram unless its de-
ferred character is in-
dicated by a suitable
symbol above or pre-
ceding the address.

NEWCOMB CARLTON
CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD

SYMBOLS
DL=Day Letter
NT=Overnight Telegram
LC=Deferred Cable
NLT=Cable Night Letter
Ship Radiogram
The filing time shown in the date line on telegrams and day letters is STANDARD TIME at point of origin. Time of receipt is STANDARD TIME at point of destination

YB 37
Dec. 15. 1942
DUPLICATE OF TELEPHONED TELEGRAM
[unclear] DEC 14 PM 12 18

GENERAL JEFFERSON RANDOLPH KEAN=
2804 N ST NW WA SHDC=

HEARTIEST CONGRATULATIONS FROM MEDICAL FACULTY GREATLY
MERITED BESTOWAL OF GORGAS MEDAL=
H E JORDAN DEAN MEDCAN SCHOOL UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA.
THE COMPANY WILL APPRECIATE SUGGESTIONS FROM ITS PATRONS CONCERNING ITS SERVICE
